statements.impact_statement: False positive. Dex v2.39.0 is not vulnerable.
False positive. Dex v2.39.0 is not vulnerable.
Not vulnerable. Elasticsearch does not take yaml configuration input from untrusted sources, and the vulnerable function is not used.
False positive. Dex v2.39.0 is not vulnerable.
Not vulnerable. The plugin that uses the vulnerable library is not used. The vulnerability also requires local access to the pod.

Not vulnerable. The v3.18 release Calico Enterprise uses libraries from Kubernetes version v1.27.16 which is end-of-life and is not receiving security updates. There may be unfixed security issues in these Kubernetes libraries. Please consider upgrading to a newer version of Calico Enterprise to receive the latest security fixes and mitigations.

statements.status_notes: No fix is available at the time of release and will be fixed in the next release.
